### Speakers  
Dr. Singla

Dr. Singla’s work focuses on reducing and preventing harmful environmental exposures for vulnerable populations. This seminar, intended for graduate students and postdocs, will use Dr. Singla’s experiences as a lens to discuss how to navigate science policy careers
